        public final void Create(android.graphics.Bitmap bmp)
        create BMP object for native using.

      • DrawRect

        public final void DrawRect(int color,
                           int x,
                           int y,
                           int width,
                           int height,
                           int mode)
        fill solid rectangle to bmp.
        Parameters:
        color - the color to fill, formatted: 0xAARRGGBB, AA: alpha value.
        x -
        y -
        width -
        height -
        mode -
        0: mix color by source pixels with alpha channel.
        1: replace pixels.

      • MulAlpha

        @Deprecated
public final void MulAlpha()
        Deprecated. 
        when display Bitmap object, adjust color value as: R = R * alpha / 255; G = G * alpha / 255; B = B * alpha / 255; for Bitmap all alpha is 0 or all alpha is 255, this method can be ignored to invoke. Deprecated since 3.12beta2, after the enhancements in the color blending & transparency composing, no need to use MulAlpha

      • Invert

      • SavePixs

        public final boolean SavePixs(java.lang.String path)
        save pixels data to file.
        Parameters:
        path - path-name to the file.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • RestorePixs

        public final boolean RestorePixs(java.lang.String path)
        restore pixels data from file
        Parameters:
        path - path-name to the file
        Returns:
        true or false. width, height, and pixels format of bitmap must match to Bitmap object, otherwise return false.
